definition: dragon boat (used at 端午[Duan1 wu3], the Dragon Boat Festival)

sentences.english: Thee Dragon-Boat Festival is the most important celebration of the Miao people, who live alongthe Qingshui Rwerin southeastem Guizhou Province.
sentences.chinese: 龍船節，是黔東南清水江上苗族人民最盛大的的節日。

sentences.english: One day, the King and all the top civil and military officials went to the ocean in a dragon boat to sightsee.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，國王和很多文武百官一起坐龍船出海遊玩。

sentences.english: Boating competitions are held here during every Dragon Boat Festival.
sentences.chinese: 每到端午節，這裏都會舉行飛舟競渡的劃龍船比賽。

definition: the multitudes come out from everywhere, emptying every alleyway (to celebrate)/the whole town turns out
to shop in preparation for Chinese New Year
surrounded by distinguished friends (idiom); in company
colored lantern (used at Lantern Festival 元宵節|元宵节)
(of a family) to come together at lunar New Year's Eve/family reunion at New Year's
to act in a play/to put on a play
to make a pilgrimage (to visit a holy site)/to go on a sightseeing tour
at the Chinese New Year or other festivities
